content: this pattern is available for free at https //www windingroadcrochet com/c2c-snowman-scarf-free-crochet-pattern/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level intermediate this pattern uses the corner to corner crochet block stitch i do have an indepth tutorial for this stitch at https //www windingroadcrochet com/corner-corner-crochet-beginners-tutorial/ with videos graphs and photo tutorial materials needed 425 yds worsted weight yarn size g crochet hook yarn needle and scissors some buttons for eyes or black yarn to make crocheted eyes this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2019 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be not refunds after purchase
